trans-unit.source: Creates a container within which other controls can share horizontal or vertical space.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个容器，其他控件可在其中共享水平或垂直空间。

trans-unit.source: Use a ToolStripPanel to hold one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> or user-defined controls.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripPanel 用于保存一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>或用户定义的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: You might find that one or more ToolStripPanel controls meet the needs of your application better than a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> if you do not need the four panels and the central <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 你可能会发现一个或多个 ToolStripPanel 控件满足你的应用程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>如果你不需要四个面板和中部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>更好的需求

trans-unit.source: You can use only one panel if you so choose, and ToolStripPanel works well in Multiple Document Interface (MDI) scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果你，因此选择，并且 ToolStripPanel 适用于多文档界面 (MDI) 方案，你可以使用只有一个面板。

trans-unit.source: Each ToolStripPanel is expandable and collapsible.
trans-unit.target: 每个 ToolStripPanel 是可展开和折叠。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> automatically adjusts its size when the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>时调整窗体自动调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> automatically resizes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>自动调整大小; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize*> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
Retrieves a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> controls.
A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> controls.
Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件之间默认指定的空间，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控件之间默认间距。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取以像素为单位，控件的内容的内部间距。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控件内容内部间距。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置哪些控件边框停靠到其父控件并确定如何随其父级调整控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
The default is None.
Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>到<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>位于指定位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> value representing the x- and y-client coordinates, in pixels, of the new location for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>值，该值表示 x 和 y 工作协调，以像素为单位的新位置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> in the specified row.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Int32> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is added.
The row parameter is less than zero (0).
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>到<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>指定坐标处。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>.
The horizontal client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 水平工作区坐标，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The vertical client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 垂直工作区坐标，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的布局引擎的缓存的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> for the control's contents.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> can be moved or resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>可以移动或调整大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> can be moved or resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref>可在移动或调整大小; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlAdded"></xref> event.
The OnControlAdded method is called when a child control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 子控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>时调用 OnControlAdded 方法

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnControlAdded method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnControlAdded 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlRemoved"></xref> event.
The OnControlRemoved is called when a child control is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnControlRemoved method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnControlRemoved 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Orientation"></xref> values.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref>用于自定义的外观<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"> </xref>。
